about_the_game:
This game takes players to a mysterious ghost road, where they take on the role of a green witch and travel along this unknown path. Using the keyboard to control the actions of the witch, players must skillfully avoid obstacles and traps ahead, such as sudden ghosts and sharp rocks, to ensure the safety of the witch. The visual effects of the game are brightly colored, with strange ghost paths contrasting sharply with vibrant green witches. In addition to avoiding obstacles, players should also pay attention to collecting additional rewards along the way, such as stars and fruits. An extremely immersive gaming experience. This game is suitable for players of all ages, as it not only tests reaction abilities but also brings the joy of exploration.

Gameplay

When you press any button, the character will automatically move forward

You cannot control the movement speed of the character

You need to avoid obstacles, otherwise you will die

Game operation mode

W=Jump

name: Cooperate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon RX 590 / Intel Arc A750

short_description: This game transports players to a mysterious Ghostly Path, where they take on the role of a green witch advancing along this path full of the unknown.
